title: Tech talk. Episodes 13 and 14

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Commonwealth Employment Service
description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. Details of what various jobs entail, the necessary qualifications and how to go about getting the job are provided. There is also a segment on survival skills. This program presented by Michael Schildberger covers the following topics:- motor mechanic, dental assistant, supermarket worker/checkout operator, how to use the CES part 1, working in the kitchen as a chef/cook, fitter and turner, recreation officer and how to use the CES part 2.
